title: Leila Alawa and the Ministry of Internal Security
subtitle: Inaccuracy reporting was common on the topic of the appointment of Leila Alawa to an advisory subcommittee of the Ministry of National Security on violent extremism.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Following the shooting of Orlando, President Obama Lila Elawa was recruited to serve on a task force of the Ministry of Internal Security to combat violent extremism.
